original: @134b 'phags pa bdud thams cad skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: @134b 'phags pa bdud thams cad skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Noble One Who Terrifies All Maras

original: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, Shakyamuni!

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma ni sha ta d'ipti /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma ni sha ta d'ipti /

original: dharma dh'a tu garbhe ma ni ma h'a ma ni /
analyzed: dharma dh'a tu garbhe ma ni ma h'a ma ni /

original: hri da ya ma ni sv'a h'a /
analyzed: hri da ya ma ni sv'a h'a /

original: sngags 'di brjod pas dkar po'i phyogs kyi lha rnams dga' zhing srung ngo //
analyzed: sngags 'di brjod pas dkar po'i phyogs kyi lha rnams dga' zhing srung ngo //
translated: By reciting this mantra, the deities of the bright side rejoice and protect.

original: nag po'i bdud thams cad dngang zhing brgyal lo //
analyzed: nag po'i bdud thams cad dngang zhing brgyal lo //
translated: All the dark maras are frightened and faint.

original: dregs pa ma rungs pa rnams skrag pa dang / brgyal lo //
analyzed: dregs pa ma rungs pa rnams skrag pa dang / brgyal lo //
translated: The unruly arrogant ones are terrified and faint.

original: bdud skrag par byed ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: bdud skrag par byed ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The Dhāraṇī That Frightens Maras is complete.
